title: Valentine’s Day Cards for Adults
text: 11 Modern Valentine’s Day Cards for Your BFF, Mom, or Grown-Up Crush February 9, 2017 1:02 AM 1 / 12 Photo: Everett Collection Perhaps the cutest thing about Valentine’s Day is a tradition we all abandoned after the age of 6 or 7: the actual giving of paper valentines. Remember those? We’d pass them out to everyone in class, names printed neatly in the designated “To” and “From” fields, Bugs Bunny dressed in pink hearts. It was a simple, rather egalitarian approach to a holiday that, as you grow up, tends to be tinged with loneliness, disappointment, or—more often than not—eye-rolling indifference. Let’s bring the sweet part back. There’s a lot of sad stuff going on out there, and now seems like a better time than ever to revisit the holiday’s most charming ritual. Here, 11 cards just waiting to be filled with a handwritten declaration of love—or, if that’s too much, a simple, “Hey, I think you’re cool” works, too.
